noBetsOnlyVotes.label: Change betting to Voting system
noBetsOnlyVotes.tooltip:
This option replaces the betting system with a voting system - this way no currency will be used.
IMPORTANT: Don't forget to change the response messages and overlay settings (e.g. currency to "votes") accordingly, since they will still be used.

votingUsesCurrency.label: Voting uses currency
votingUsesCurrency.tooltip: When the betting system changed to "Voting System", this checkbox decides if viewers require channel currency to be able to vote

fixedVotingAmount.label: Voting Fixed Currency Amount
fixedVotingAmount.tooltip:
This field determines how much channel currency the viewer has to have to be able to vote for #win or #lose.
This field is only used if the betting system is changed to "Voting System" and when "Voting uses Currency" is active.

betDuration.label: Bet Duration (in Seconds)
betDuration.tooltip:
After how many seconds - after the game has started - will the bet be closed?
Notice: Keep in mind that you dont want people to bet shortly before the game is decided (We recommend 120 seconds).

rewardMultiplier.label: Payout Multiplier
rewardMultiplier.tooltip:
Set multiplier of the betting amounts (x1.0 = original amount).
Example: x2.5 = Gives you 250% of the amount you bet. Risk 100 and you get 250 if you gambled correct.
This field is only used if this is either a voting system with currency, or a betting system.

minBet.label: Minimal Bet Amount
minBet.tooltip: Minimal amount of points (currency) to bet.

maxBet.label: Maximum Bet Amount
maxBet.tooltip: Maximum Amount of points (currency) to bet.

cmdBetWin.label: The command the viewers have to use to gamble on the streamer to win this match.

cmdBetLose.label: The command the viewers have to use to gamble on the streamer to lose this match.

cmdAbort.label: Abort command which cancels the running bet (even after the bet has closed) and refunds every participant.

allowModsToAbort.label: Can Bets be aborted by Mods?
allowModsToAbort.tooltip: Are moderators also allowed to abort bets?

bnetUsername1.label: Name of Account #1
bnetUsername1.tooltip:
Name of your StarCraft II nickname (For each region and no Bnet ID e.g. Brain#1337). 
 Example: Brain

bnetUsername2.label: Name of Account #2
bnetUsername2.tooltip:
Name of your StarCraft II nickname (For each region and no Bnet ID e.g. Burny#1338). 
 Example: Burny

bnetUsername3.label: Name of Account #3
bnetUsername3.tooltip: Name of your StarCraft II nickname (For each region and no Bnet ID).

bnetUsername4.label: Name of Account #4
bnetUsername4.tooltip: Name of your StarCraft II nickname (For each region and no Bnet ID).

bnetUsername5.label: Name of Account #5
bnetUsername5.tooltip: Name of your StarCraft II nickname (For each region and no Bnet ID).

responseBetOpened.value: $mychannel has joined a new match. Betting is now open.
responseBetOpened.label: Bet has started
responseBetOpened.tooltip:
Notification message when a new bet has started (automatically starts when a 1v1 is detected, excluding matches vs AI).
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseBetClosed.value: Countdown has ended. Betting has now closed.
responseBetClosed.label: Bet has closed
responseBetClosed.tooltip:
Notification message when the new bet has closed.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseBetCanceled.value: Canceling the running bet. Refunding every participant.
responseBetCanceled.label: Bet was canceled
responseBetCanceled.tooltip:
Notification message for the cancel of a running bet. The bets get refunded.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseVictoryCorrectBets.value: $mychannel has won the game. Total payout of $totalPointsWon: $winnersWithAmount.
responseVictoryCorrectBets.label: Match won - Had correct bets
responseVictoryCorrectBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was won and people did bet on it.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseVictoryWrongBets.value: $mychannel has won the game. Noone has gambled correctly, a total of $totalAmountGambled $currencyName have been lost.
responseVictoryWrongBets.label: Match won - Had no correct bets
responseVictoryWrongBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was won and nobody did bet on it.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseVictoryNoBets.value: $mychannel has won the game. Bet next time to earn some $currencyName!
responseVictoryNoBets.label: Match won - No bets
responseVictoryNoBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was won and nobody did bet at all.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseDefeatCorrectBets.value: $mychannel has lost the game. Total payout of $totalPointsWon: $winnersWithAmount.
responseDefeatCorrectBets.label: Match lost - Had correct bets
responseDefeatCorrectBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was lost and people did bet on it.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseDefeatWrongBets.value: $mychannel has lost the game. Noone has gambled correctly, a total of $totalAmountGambled $currencyName have been lost.
responseDefeatWrongBets.label: Match lost - Had no correct bets
responseDefeatWrongBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was lost and nobody did bet on it.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseDefeatNoBets.value: $mychannel has lost the game. Bet next time to earn some $currencyName!
responseDefeatNoBets.label: Match lost - No bets
responseDefeatNoBets.tooltip:
Message when the match was lost and nobody did bet at all.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseHowToUseBetCommand.value: Write "$cmdBetWin <amount>" or "$cmdBetLose <amount>" to bet some of your $currencyName!
responseHowToUseBetCommand.label: Help Command
responseHowToUseBetCommand.tooltip:
Message which gets triggered when a command gets written alone (#win) or when there is no number after the command (#win <nonumber>).
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: @$user you don"t seem to have that many $currencyName.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough Currency
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message when the user has not as many points as he wants to bet.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseUserJoinedBet.label: People who joined the Bet
responseUserJoinedBet.tooltip:
Message which posts every user who joined the bet in 3sec intervals (after the last bet).
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseUserAlreadyPlacedBet.value: @$user you already joined the bet! Wait for the next game to start to make another bet.
responseUserAlreadyPlacedBet.label: Already placed Bet
responseUserAlreadyPlacedBet.tooltip:
Message when the user tries to bet again during the same match.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseNotCorrectBetAmount.value: @$user the betting amount has to be between $minBet and $maxBet!
responseNotCorrectBetAmount.label: Invalid Bet Amount
responseNotCorrectBetAmount.tooltip:
Message when the user tries to bet something which is not between your set minBet and maxBet amounts.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseStarcraftClosed.value: StarCraft has ended while a bet was running. Refunding every participant.
responseStarcraftClosed.label: StarCraft II crashed
responseStarcraftClosed.tooltip:
Message when StarCraft II crashed. The points will be refunded.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

responseTwoMatchingNames.value: Bet has failed to start because both players are in $mychannel's list of StarCraft player names.
responseTwoMatchingNames.label: Both names are found in the SC2 Accounts
responseTwoMatchingNames.tooltip:
Message when both players have the same name or the opponent has a name from your Player Names list.
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

isPercentageBased.label: Display percentages
isPercentageBased.tooltip:
This option changes the overlay to display percentages instead of absolute numbers
e.g. for voting, it will now show 75% voted on the player and 25% on the opponent

overlayTitle.label: Title
overlayTitle.tooltip: Set the title for the overlay.

overlayCurrencyShortName.label: Shortname for Currency (max 8 digits)
overlayCurrencyShortName.tooltip:
If you have a long currency name you can set a custom one here.
If you dont set a shortname the normal currency name will be cut off at 8 digits.
If left empty, it will use the default channel currency.
IMPORTANT: If you use the voting system, put in "votes" here.

overlayChatCmdWin.label: Chat Command Example Win (max 20 digits)
overlayChatCmdWin.tooltip:
Example text for people to see how to bet on the streamer.
E.g. for betting you can put "$cmdBetWin {Amount}"
E.g. for voting system you can just put "$cmdBetWin"

overlayChatCmdLose.label: Chat Command Example Lose (max 20 digits)
overlayChatCmdLose.tooltip:
Example text for people to see how to bet against the streamer.
E.g. for betting you can put "$cmdBetLose {Amount}"
E.g. for voting system you can just put "$cmdBetLose"

overlayLabelWin.label: Label Field left side (max 24 digits)
overlayLabelWin.tooltip: Text which gets displayed next to the total amount of points bet on the streamer.

overlayLabelLose.label: Label Field right side (max 24 digits)
overlayLabelLose.tooltip: Text which gets displayed next to the total amount of points bet against the streamer.

overlayShowWinnerDuration.label: Duration for highlighting Winner
overlayShowWinnerDuration.tooltip: Set the duration where the winner gets highlighted before hiding the Bet.

overlayHideBetAfterClosed.label: Hide Bet Overlay after Closing
overlayHideBetAfterClosed.tooltip:
Decide if you want to hide the bet after closing.
It will show up to announce the winner at the end.

overlayFadeInType.label: Fade-In Type
overlayFadeInType.tooltip: Decide from which side you want the overlay to fade in.

devEnableVsAi.label: Enable in vs AI games
devEnableVsAi.tooltip: Enable this if you want to see if the betting system works against AI - careful, bets will still be accepted!

devAllowMultipleEntries.label: Allow multiple entries
devAllowMultipleEntries.tooltip:
Enable if you are testing if multiple entries work for betting and voting system!
WARNING: This is not a feature, this can lead to unpredictable errors, e.g. charging betting users double the amount, ignoring their 2nd and 3rd (and so on) bet, multiple payout might not be working.
